channel.title: Comments on: Reunion
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: I had forgotten that you were originally from NE Ohio. I can personally attest to the frequency of temporal rifts around here -- just yesterday felt like winter (I swear I saw it snowing), today feels like spring, and all around are leaves changing colors.
item.content:encoded: I had forgotten that you were originally from NE Ohio. I can personally attest to the frequency of temporal rifts around here — just yesterday felt like winter (I swear I saw it snowing), today feels like spring, and all around are leaves changing colors.
